licenses.Basic.title: ctrlX OS License - PLC Basic (02VRS+)
licenses.Basic.description: IEC 61131 PLC runtime with support for single core, single task and 256 byte IO data
licenses.Standard.title: ctrlX OS License - PLC Standard (02VRS+ / add-on)
licenses.Standard.description: IEC 61131 PLC runtime with support for single core, multiple tasks and 1 kByte IO data - upgrade of PLC Basic license
licenses.Advanced.title: ctrlX OS License - PLC Advanced (02VRS+ / add-on)
licenses.Advanced.description: IEC 61131 PLC runtime with support for multiple cores, multiple tasks and 2 kByte IO data - upgrade of PLC Standard license
licenses.Performance.title: ctrlX OS License - PLC Performance (02VRS+ / add-on)
licenses.Performance.description: IEC 61131 PLC runtime with support for multiple cores, multiple tasks and max. IO data - upgrade of PLC Advanced license
licenses.enipsnc.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - EtherNet/IP Scanner (add-on)
licenses.enipsnc.description: Enables ctrlX CORE to exchange data with Ethernet/IP Adapter devices
licenses.smot.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - Softmotion (01VRS / add-on)
licenses.smot.description: Enables the control of single-axis and synchronized multi-axis movements
licenses.smotcnc.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - Softmotion CNC (01VRS / add-on)
licenses.smotcnc.description: Enables the control of CNC machines and industrial robots (4-axis-kinematics)
licenses.smoax04.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 4 Axes (02VRS+)
licenses.smoax04.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 4 Axes extends the functional range of ctrlX PLC systems with motion control functionality for up to 4 real plus 4 virtual axes
licenses.smoax08.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 8 Axes (02VRS+)
licenses.smoax08.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 8 Axes extends the functional range of ctrlX PLC systems with motion control functionality for up to 8 real plus 8 virtual axes
licenses.smoax16.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 16 Axes (02VRS+)
licenses.smoax16.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 16 Axes extends the functional range of ctrlX PLC systems with motion control functionality for up to 16 real plus 16 virtual axes
licenses.smoax32.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 32 Axes (02VRS+)
licenses.smoax32.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 32 Axes extends the functional range of ctrlX PLC systems with motion control functionality for up to 32 real plus 32 virtual axes
licenses.smoax48.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 48 Axes (02VRS+)
licenses.smoax48.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 48 Axes extends the functional range of ctrlX PLC systems with motion control functionality for up to 48 real plus 48 virtual axes
licenses.smogr01.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 1 Axes Group / CNC interpolator (02VRS+)
licenses.smogr01.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 1 Axis Group/CNC Interpolator enables the operation of 1 axis group (kinematic) or 1 CNC interpolator
licenses.smogr02.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 2 Axes Groups / CNC interpolators (02VRS+)
licenses.smogr02.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 2 Axis Groups/CNC Interpolators enables the operation of 2 axis groups (kinematics) or 2 CNC interpolator
licenses.smogr03.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 3 Axes Groups / CNC interpolators (02VRS+)
licenses.smogr03.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 3 Axis Groups/CNC Interpolators enables the operation of 3 axis groups (kinematics) or 3 CNC interpolator
licenses.smogr04.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 4 Axes Groups / CNC interpolators (02VRS+)
licenses.smogr04.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 4 Axis Groups/CNC Interpolators enables the operation of 4 axis groups (kinematics) or 4 CNC interpolator
licenses.smogr05.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 5 Axes Groups / CNC interpolators (02VRS+)
licenses.smogr05.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 5 Axis Groups/CNC Interpolators enables the operation of 5 axis groups (kinematics) or 5 CNC interpolator
licenses.smogr06.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion 6 Axes Groups / CNC interpolators (02VRS+)
licenses.smogr06.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 6 Axis Groups/CNC Interpolators enables the operation of 6 axis groups (kinematics) or 6 CNC interpolator
licenses.smogrup01.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion Upgrade 1 Axes Group / CNC interpolator
licenses.smogrup01.description: CODESYS SoftMotion 1 Axis Group/CNC Interpolator upgrade enables the operation of 1 axis group (kinematic) or 1 CNC interpolator
licenses.smoaxup08.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - SoftMotion Upgrade 8 Axes
licenses.smoaxup08.description: CODESYS SoftMotion upgrade 8 Axis enables the operation of additional 8 axis
licenses.pndev.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - Communication IEC61784 Family 3 Device (add-on)
licenses.pndev.description: Enables ctrlX CORE to exchange data with a PROFINET Controller
licenses.webvisu.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - WebVisu (add-on)
licenses.webvisu.description: WebVisu opens up the possibility of displaying graphical user interfaces
licenses.visu2k.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - VISU 2K Tags (add-on)
licenses.visu2k.description: CODESYS Visualization 2K enables a CODESYS visualization WebVisu with up to 2048 data points
licenses.visu4k.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - VISU 4K Tags (add-on)
licenses.visu4k.description: CODESYS Visualization 4K enables a CODESYS visualization WebVisu with up to 4096 data points
licenses.visu8k.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - VISU 8K Tags (add-on)
licenses.visu8k.description: CODESYS Visualization 8K enables a CODESYS visualization WebVisu with up to 8192 data points
licenses.visuunlimt.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - VISU unlimited Tags (add-on)
licenses.visuunlimt.description: CODESYS Visualization unlimited enables a CODESYS visualization WebVisu with unlimited data points
licenses.pncon.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - Communication IEC61784 Family 3 Controller (add-on)
licenses.pncon.description: Enables ctrlX CORE to exchange data with PROFINET Devices
licenses.enipadp.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - EtherNet/IP Adapter (add-on)
licenses.enipadp.description: Enables ctrlX CORE to exchange data with an Ethernet/IP Scanner
licenses.iiotlib.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - IIoT Libraries (add-on)
licenses.iiotlib.description: IIoT Libraries SL - the perfect package for IIoT communication
licenses.ecatmas.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - EtherCAT Master (add-on)
licenses.ecatmas.description: Integrated EtherCAT master support in the IEC 61131-3 development system
licenses.iolink.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - IO-Link (add-on)
licenses.iolink.description: CODESYS IO-Link allows integration of IO-Link devices into ctrlX PLC projects
licenses.canman.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - CANopen Manager (add-on)
licenses.canman.description: Configurator, protocol stack and diagnostics for CANopen Manager, fully integrated in the IEC 61131-3 development system
licenses.candev.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - CANopen Device (add-on)
licenses.candev.description: Configurator, protocol stack and diagnostics for CANopen Device, fully integrated in the IEC 61131-3 development system
licenses.mbtcmas.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - Modbus TCP Master (add-on)
licenses.mbtcmas.description: Modbus TCP Server that is programmable with ctrlX PLC Engineering
licenses.mbtcdev.title: ctrlX OS License - CODESYS - Modbus TCP Device (add-on)
licenses.mbtcdev.description: Modbus TCP Client to exchange data with Modbus TCP Servers
